data.details:
Harry Potter Community 5 Camporee

Are you a muggle Girl Scout who loves witchcraft and wizardry? If the answer is yes, join us at Camp Hogwarts! All Girl Scouts who attend Camp Hogwarts will learn the basic skills of wizardry including, potions, herbology, wizard crafts, and more! Learn how to play quidditch like Harry Potter during our special quidditch match for all Girl Scouts. Plus, Junior muggles will be able to participate in our tri-wizard tournament! Get dressed up like Hermione and attend our Grand Wizard Ball on Saturday night! The fun won’t end at Camp Hogwarts and you don’t want to miss it! Attire: casual, wands and robes welcome but not mandatory.

** Camporees are open to all registered Girl Scouts of Gateway Council.  All adults must be registered and approved volunteers.

**  Last day to register: October 21, 2015
